Every time we increase the size of the company, we need to keep things going to make sure we keep our speed, pace, and passion. The new weekly ritual-like the surprise announcement on Jan. 20 that Larry Page will take over from Eric Schmidt in April-marks a significant shift in strategy at the world's most famous Internet company.
